characters.story: Like a mouth, this character means funeral and shouts "Sahng!"!
"Yahn!" The bird at the funeral commanded sharply - a wild goose honking!
See how the heart forms ought to? It sings "Ying!" cheerfully!
The strokes unite to show bird, whispering "Nyao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Ying!" The bird ought to sing cheerfully - a hawk, falcon or eagle!
A striking symbol for duck that sings "Yah!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
See how the mountain forms island? It whispers "Dao" softly!
"Yoo!" A bird on the road commanded sharply - time to encounter, meet for an interview!
The strokes unite to show ten thousand, shouting "Wahn!" sharply!
Picture to stride taking form - it shouts "Migh!" with vivid energy!
The mountain stands for ridge of a hill, singing "Gahng!" cheerfully!
"Gahng!" The ridge and sword sang cheerfully - just now, hard, firm, tough and sturdy!
Picture deficient taking form - it sings "Chyueh!" with vivid energy!
The shellfish takes the shape of treasure, whispering "Bao" softly!
A striking symbol for remote that asks "Yao? Far away?" curiously!
"Yao, should we rock it?" The remote hand questioned shaking curiously - time to swing!
This character represents rabbit, shouting "Too!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Yee!" The rabbit on the road commanded sharply to flee - escape, elude and break loose!
This character represents to avoid, whispering "Myan" softly!
The sun takes the shape of nightfall, whispering "Wahn" softly!
Picture elephant taking form - it shouts "Shyahng!" with vivid energy!
